verses.verse: ( The Triumphal Entry) ( ( 450 9:9-13 ; 470 21:1-11 ; 490 19:28-40 ; 500 12:12-19 )) Καὶ <WG2532> Kai - ὅτε <WG3753> hote As ἐγγίζουσιν <WG1448> engizousin they approached εἰς <WG1519> eis . . . Ἱεροσόλυμα <WG2414> Hierosolyma Jerusalem εἰς <WG1519> eis [and came] to Βηθφαγὴ <WG967> Bēthphagē Bethphage καὶ <WG2532> kai and Βηθανίαν <WG963> Bēthanian Bethany πρὸς <WG4314> pros at τὸ <WG3588> to the ὄρος <WG3735> oros Mount τῶν <WG3588> tōn - Ἐλαιῶν <WG1636> Elaiōn of Olives , ἀποστέλλει <WG649> apostellei [Jesus] sent out δύο <WG1417> dyo two τῶν <WG3588> tōn of μαθητῶν <WG3101> mathētōn disciples αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou His

καὶ <WG2532> kai and λέγει <WG3004> legei said αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois to them , Ὑπάγετε <WG5217> Hypagete “ Go εἰς <WG1519> eis into τὴν <WG3588> tēn the κώμην <WG2968> kōmēn village τὴν <WG3588> tēn - κατέναντι <WG2713> katenanti ahead of ὑμῶν <WG4771> hymōn you , καὶ <WG2532> kai and εὐθὺς <WG2112> euthys as soon εἰσπορευόμενοι <WG1531> eisporeuomenoi as you enter εἰς <WG1519> eis . . . αὐτὴν <WG846> autēn it , εὑρήσετε <WG2147> heurēsete you will find πῶλον <WG4454> pōlon a colt δεδεμένον <WG1210> dedemenon tied [there] , ἐφ’ <WG1909> eph’ on ὃν <WG3739> hon which οὐδεὶς <WG3762> oudeis no one οὔπω <WG3768> oupō vvv ἀνθρώπων <WG444> anthrōpōn . . . ἐκάθισεν <WG2523> ekathisen has ever sat . λύσατε <WG3089> lysate Untie αὐτὸν <WG846> auton it καὶ <WG2532> kai and φέρετε <WG5342> pherete bring [it here] .

καὶ <WG2532> kai - ἐάν <WG1437> ean If τις <WG5100> tis anyone ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin - , εἴπῃ <WG2036> eipē asks Τί <WG5101> Ti ‘ Why ποιεῖτε <WG4160> poieite are you doing τοῦτο <WG3778> touto this ?’ εἴπατε <WG2036> eipate tell [him] ‹Ὅτι› <WG3754> Hoti - , Ὁ <WG3588> HO ‘ The Κύριος <WG2962> Kyrios Lord αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou it χρείαν <WG5532> chreian needs ἔχει <WG2192> echei vvv καὶ <WG2532> kai and εὐθὺς <WG2112> euthys shortly . ’” αὐτὸν <WG846> auton it ἀποστέλλει <WG649> apostellei will return πάλιν <WG3825> palin . . . ὧδε <WG5602> hōde . . .

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai So ἀπῆλθον <WG565> apēlthon they went καὶ <WG2532> kai and εὗρον <WG2147> heuron found πῶλον <WG4454> pōlon [the] colt δεδεμένον <WG1210> dedemenon tied πρὸς <WG4314> pros at θύραν <WG2374> thyran a doorway . ἔξω <WG1854> exō outside ἐπὶ <WG1909> epi in τοῦ <WG3588> tou the ἀμφόδου <WG296> amphodou street , καὶ <WG2532> kai - λύουσιν <WG3089> lyousin They untied αὐτόν <WG846> auton it ,

καί <WG2532> kai and τινες <WG5100> tines some τῶν <WG3588> tōn who were ἐκεῖ <WG1563> ekei there ἑστηκότων <WG2476> hestēkotōn standing ἔλεγον <WG2036> elegon asked αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois . . . , Τί <WG5101> Ti “ Why ποιεῖτε <WG4160> poieite are you λύοντες <WG3089> lyontes untying τὸν <WG3588> ton the πῶλον <WG4454> pōlon colt ? ”

Οἱ <WG3588> Hoi - δὲ <WG1161> de - εἶπαν <WG2036> eipan [The disciples] answered αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois . . . καθὼς <WG2531> kathōs as εἶπεν <WG2036> eipen had instructed [them] , ὁ <WG3588> ho - Ἰησοῦς <WG2424> Iēsous Jesus καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἀφῆκαν <WG863> aphēkan [the people] gave them permission αὐτούς <WG846> autous . . . .

καὶ <WG2532> kai Then φέρουσιν <WG5342> pherousin they led τὸν <WG3588> ton the πῶλον <WG4454> pōlon colt πρὸς <WG4314> pros to τὸν <WG3588> ton - Ἰησοῦν <WG2424> Iēsoun Jesus καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἐπιβάλλουσιν <WG1911> epiballousin threw αὐτῷ <WG846> autō over it , τὰ <WG3588> ta - ἱμάτια <WG2440> himatia cloaks αὐτῶν <WG846> autōn their καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἐκάθισεν <WG2523> ekathisen He sat ἐπ’ <WG1909> ep’ on αὐτόν <WG846> auton it .

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai - πολλοὶ <WG4183> polloi Many [ in the crowd ] τὰ <WG3588> ta - ἱμάτια <WG2440> himatia cloaks αὐτῶν <WG846> autōn their ἔστρωσαν <WG4766> estrōsan spread εἰς <WG1519> eis on τὴν <WG3588> tēn the ὁδόν <WG3598> hodon road , ἄλλοι <WG243> alloi others [spread] δὲ <WG1161> de while στιβάδας <WG4746> stibadas branches κόψαντες <WG2875> kopsantes they had cut ἐκ <WG1537> ek from τῶν <WG3588> tōn the ἀγρῶν <WG68> agrōn fields .

καὶ <WG2532> kai - οἱ <WG3588> hoi The [ones who] προάγοντες <WG4254> proagontes went ahead καὶ <WG2532> kai and οἱ <WG3588> hoi those who ἀκολουθοῦντες <WG190> akolouthountes followed ἔκραζον <WG2896> ekrazon were shouting : Ὡσαννά <WG5614> Hōsanna “ Hosanna !” ( Hosanna is a transliteration of the Hebrew Hosia-na, meaning Save, we pray or Save now, which became a shout of praise; see .) Εὐλογημένος <WG2127> Eulogēmenos “ Blessed is ὁ <WG3588> ho He [who] ἐρχόμενος <WG2064> erchomenos comes ἐν <WG1722> en in ὀνόματι <WG3686> onomati [the] name Κυρίου <WG2962> Kyriou of [the] Lord !” ( )

Εὐλογημένη <WG2127> Eulogēmenē “ Blessed ἡ <WG3588> hē [is] the ἐρχομένη <WG2064> erchomenē coming βασιλεία <WG932> basileia kingdom τοῦ <WG3588> tou - πατρὸς <WG3962> patros father ἡμῶν <WG1473> hēmōn of our Δαυίδ <WG1138> Dauid David !” Ὡσαννὰ <WG5614> Hōsanna “ Hosanna ἐν <WG1722> en in τοῖς <WG3588> tois the ὑψίστοις <WG5310> hypsistois highest !” ( Or “Hosanna in the highest heaven!” See and .)

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai Then εἰσῆλθεν <WG1525> eisēlthen [Jesus] entered εἰς <WG1519> eis . . . Ἱεροσόλυμα <WG2414> Hierosolyma Jerusalem εἰς <WG1519> eis [and went] into τὸ <WG3588> to the ἱερόν <WG2411> hieron temple [courts] . ( Literally the temple; also in verses 15, 16, and 27) καὶ <WG2532> kai - περιβλεψάμενος <WG4017> periblepsamenos He looked around at πάντα <WG3956> panta everything , ὀψὲ <WG3796> opse late , ἤδη <WG2235> ēdē already οὔσης <WG1510> ousēs was τῆς <WG3588> tēs [but since] ὥρας <WG5610> hōras [it] ἐξῆλθεν <WG1831> exēlthen He went out εἰς <WG1519> eis to Βηθανίαν <WG963> Bēthanian Bethany μετὰ <WG3326> meta with τῶν <WG3588> tōn the δώδεκα <WG1427> dōdeka Twelve .

( Jesus Curses the Fig Tree) ( ( 470 21:18-22 ; 480 11:20-25 )) Καὶ <WG2532> Kai - τῇ <WG3588> tē The ἐπαύριον <WG1887> epaurion next day , ἐξελθόντων <WG1831> exelthontōn had left αὐτῶν <WG846> autōn [when] they ἀπὸ <WG575> apo . . . Βηθανίας <WG963> Bēthanias Bethany , ἐπείνασεν <WG3983> epeinasen [Jesus] was hungry .

καὶ <WG2532> kai - ἰδὼν <WG3708> idōn Seeing συκῆν <WG4808> sykēn a fig tree ἀπὸ <WG575> apo in μακρόθεν <WG3113> makrothen the distance ἔχουσαν <WG2192> echousan in φύλλα <WG5444> phylla leaf , ἦλθεν <WG2064> ēlthen He went εἰ <WG1487> ei if ἄρα <WG687> ara there was τι <WG5100> ti any [fruit] εὑρήσει <WG2147> heurēsei to see ἐν <WG1722> en on αὐτῇ <WG846> autē it . καὶ <WG2532> kai But when ἐλθὼν <WG2064> elthōn He reached ἐπ’ <WG1909> ep’ . . . αὐτὴν <WG846> autēn it , οὐδὲν <WG3762> ouden nothing [on it] εὗρεν <WG2147> heuren He found εἰ <WG1487> ei except μὴ <WG3361> mē . . . φύλλα <WG5444> phylla leaves , ὁ <WG3588> ho the γὰρ <WG1063> gar since καιρὸς <WG2540> kairos season οὐκ <WG3756> ouk not ἦν <WG1510> ēn it was σύκων <WG4810> sykōn for figs .

καὶ <WG2532> kai Then ἀποκριθεὶς <WG611> apokritheis vvv εἶπεν <WG2036> eipen He said αὐτῇ <WG846> autē to [the tree] , Μηκέτι <WG3371> Mēketi ever εἰς <WG1519> eis . . . τὸν <WG3588> ton . . . αἰῶνα <WG165> aiōna . . . ἐκ <WG1537> ek of σοῦ <WG4771> sou your μηδεὶς <WG3367> mēdeis “ May no one καρπὸν <WG2590> karpon fruit again . ” φάγοι <WG5315> phagoi eat καὶ <WG2532> kai And ἤκουον <WG191> ēkouon heard [this statement] . οἱ <WG3588> hoi - μαθηταὶ <WG3101> mathētai disciples αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou His

( Jesus Cleanses the Temple) ( ( 470 21:12-17 ; 490 19:45-48 ; 500 2:12-25 )) Καὶ <WG2532> Kai When ἔρχονται <WG2064> erchontai they arrived εἰς <WG1519> eis in Ἱεροσόλυμα <WG2414> Hierosolyma Jerusalem , Καὶ <WG2532> Kai - εἰσελθὼν <WG1525> eiselthōn [Jesus] entered εἰς <WG1519> eis . . . τὸ <WG3588> to the ἱερὸν <WG2411> hieron temple [courts] ἤρξατο <WG756> ērxato [and] began ἐκβάλλειν <WG1544> ekballein to drive out τοὺς <WG3588> tous - πωλοῦντας <WG4453> pōlountas selling καὶ <WG2532> kai and τοὺς <WG3588> tous those who ἀγοράζοντας <WG59> agorazontas were buying ἐν <WG1722> en vvv τῷ <WG3588> tō vvv ἱερῷ <WG2411> hierō [there] . καὶ <WG2532> kai - τὰς <WG3588> tas the τραπέζας <WG5132> trapezas tables τῶν <WG3588> tōn of the κολλυβιστῶν <WG2855> kollybistōn money changers καὶ <WG2532> kai and τὰς <WG3588> tas the καθέδρας <WG2515> kathedras seats τῶν <WG3588> tōn of those πωλούντων <WG4453> pōlountōn selling τὰς <WG3588> tas - περιστερὰς <WG4058> peristeras doves . κατέστρεψεν <WG2690> katestrepsen He overturned

καὶ <WG2532> kai And οὐκ <WG3756> ouk vvv ἤφιεν <WG863> ēphien He would not allow ἵνα <WG2443> hina - τις <WG5100> tis anyone διενέγκῃ <WG1308> dienenkē to carry σκεῦος <WG4632> skeuos merchandise διὰ <WG1223> dia through τοῦ <WG3588> tou the ἱεροῦ <WG2411> hierou temple [courts] .

καὶ <WG2532> kai Then ἐδίδασκεν <WG1321> edidasken [Jesus] began to teach καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἔλεγεν <WG2036> elegen He declared , αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois them , Οὐ <WG3756> Ou “ vvv γέγραπται <WG1125> gegraptai Is it not written ὅτι <WG3754> hoti - : Ὁ <WG3588> Ho - οἶκός <WG3624> oikos house μου <WG1473> mou ‘ My οἶκος <WG3624> oikos a house προσευχῆς <WG4335> proseuchēs of prayer κληθήσεται <WG2564> klēthēsetai will be called πᾶσιν <WG3956> pasin for all τοῖς <WG3588> tois the ἔθνεσιν <WG1484> ethnesin nations ’ ? ( ) ὑμεῖς <WG4771> hymeis you δὲ <WG1161> de But πεποιήκατε <WG4160> pepoiēkate have made αὐτὸν <WG846> auton it Σπήλαιον <WG4693> Spēlaion ‘ a den λῃστῶν <WG3027> lēstōn of robbers .’ ” ( )

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai When ἤκουσαν <WG191> ēkousan heard [this] , οἱ <WG3588> hoi the ἀρχιερεῖς <WG749> archiereis chief priests καὶ <WG2532> kai and οἱ <WG3588> hoi - γραμματεῖς <WG1122> grammateis scribes καὶ <WG2532> kai - ἐζήτουν <WG2212> ezētoun they looked for πῶς <WG4459> pōs a way αὐτὸν <WG846> auton Him . ἀπολέσωσιν <WG622> apolesōsin to kill ἐφοβοῦντο <WG5399> ephobounto they were afraid γὰρ <WG1063> gar For αὐτόν <WG846> auton of Him , πᾶς <WG3956> pas whole γὰρ <WG1063> gar because ὁ <WG3588> ho the ὄχλος <WG3793> ochlos crowd ἐξεπλήσσετο <WG1605> exeplēsseto was astonished ἐπὶ <WG1909> epi at τῇ <WG3588> tē - διδαχῇ <WG1322> didachē teaching . αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou His

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai And ὅταν <WG3752> hotan when ὀψὲ <WG3796> opse evening ἐγένετο <WG1096> egeneto came , ἐξεπορεύοντο <WG1607> exeporeuonto [Jesus and His disciples] went ( Literally they went; BYZ and TR He went) ἔξω <WG1854> exō out of τῆς <WG3588> tēs the πόλεως <WG4172> poleōs city .

( The Withered Fig Tree) ( ( 470 21:18-22 ; 480 11:12-14 )) Καὶ <WG2532> Kai [As] παραπορευόμενοι <WG3899> paraporeuomenoi they were walking back πρωῒ <WG4404> prōi in the morning , εἶδον <WG3708> eidon they saw τὴν <WG3588> tēn the συκῆν <WG4808> sykēn fig tree ἐξηραμμένην <WG3583> exērammenēn withered ἐκ <WG1537> ek from ῥιζῶν <WG4491> rhizōn [its] roots .

καὶ <WG2532> kai - ἀναμνησθεὶς <WG363> anamnēstheis remembered [it] ὁ <WG3588> ho - Πέτρος <WG4074> Petros Peter λέγει <WG3004> legei [and] said αὐτῷ <WG846> autō - , Ῥαββί <WG4461> Rhabbi Rabbi ! ἴδε <WG2400> ide “ Look , ἡ <WG3588> hē The συκῆ <WG4808> sykē fig tree ἣν <WG3739> hēn - κατηράσω <WG2672> katērasō You cursed ἐξήρανται <WG3583> exērantai has withered . ”

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai - ἀποκριθεὶς <WG611> apokritheis vvv ὁ <WG3588> ho - Ἰησοῦς <WG2424> Iēsous Jesus λέγει <WG3004> legei said αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois to them . Ἔχετε <WG2192> Echete “ Have πίστιν <WG4102> pistin faith θεοῦ <WG2316> theou in God , ”

ἀμὴν <WG281> amēn “ Truly λέγω <WG3004> legō I tell ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin you ὅτι <WG3754> hoti that ὃς <WG3739> hos if anyone ἂν <WG302> an . . . εἴπῃ <WG2036> eipē says τῷ <WG3588> tō - ὄρει <WG3735> orei mountain , τούτῳ <WG3778> toutō to this Ἄρθητι <WG142> Arthēti ‘ Be lifted up καὶ <WG2532> kai and βλήθητι <WG906> blēthēti thrown εἰς <WG1519> eis into τὴν <WG3588> tēn the θάλασσαν <WG2281> thalassan sea ,’ καὶ <WG2532> kai and μὴ <WG3361> mē vvv διακριθῇ <WG1252> diakrithē has no doubt ἐν <WG1722> en in τῇ <WG3588> tē - καρδίᾳ <WG2588> kardia heart αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou his ἀλλὰ <WG235> alla but πιστεύῃ <WG4100> pisteuē believes ὅτι <WG3754> hoti that ὃ <WG3739> ho vvv λαλεῖ <WG2980> lalei [it] γίνεται <WG1096> ginetai will happen , ἔσται <WG1510> estai it will be done αὐτῷ <WG846> autō for him .

διὰ <WG1223> dia Therefore τοῦτο <WG3778> touto . . . λέγω <WG3004> legō I tell ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin you , πάντα <WG3956> panta vvv ὅσα <WG3745> hosa whatever προσεύχεσθε <WG4336> proseuchesthe in prayer , καὶ <WG2532> kai - αἰτεῖσθε <WG154> aiteisthe you ask for πιστεύετε <WG4100> pisteuete believe ὅτι <WG3754> hoti that ἐλάβετε <WG2983> elabete you have received [it] , καὶ <WG2532> kai and [it] ἔσται <WG1510> estai will be ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin yours .

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai And ὅταν <WG3752> hotan when στήκετε <WG4739> stēkete you stand προσευχόμενοι <WG4336> proseuchomenoi to pray , ἀφίετε <WG863> aphiete forgive [it] , εἴ <WG1487> ei if τι <WG5100> ti anything ἔχετε <WG2192> echete you hold κατά <WG2596> kata against τινος <WG5100> tinos [another] , ἵνα <WG2443> hina so that καὶ <WG2532> kai as well . ” ( BYZ and TR include 26But if you do not forgive, neither will your Father in heaven forgive your trespasses; see .) ὁ <WG3588> ho - Πατὴρ <WG3962> Patēr Father ὑμῶν <WG4771> hymōn your ὁ <WG3588> ho - ἐν <WG1722> en in τοῖς <WG3588> tois - οὐρανοῖς <WG3772> ouranois heaven ἀφῇ <WG863> aphē will forgive ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin vvv τὰ <WG3588> ta - παραπτώματα <WG3900> paraptōmata trespasses ὑμῶν <WG4771> hymōn your

( Jesus’ Authority Challenged) ( ( 470 21:23-27 ; 490 20:1-8 )) Καὶ <WG2532> Kai - ἔρχονται <WG2064> erchontai After their return πάλιν <WG3825> palin . . . εἰς <WG1519> eis to Ἱεροσόλυμα <WG2414> Hierosolyma Jerusalem , καὶ <WG2532> kai . . . ἐν <WG1722> en in τῷ <WG3588> tō the ἱερῷ <WG2411> hierō temple [courts] , περιπατοῦντος <WG4043> peripatountos was walking αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou [Jesus] ἔρχονται <WG2064> erchontai came up πρὸς <WG4314> pros to αὐτὸν <WG846> auton Him . οἱ <WG3588> hoi [and] the ἀρχιερεῖς <WG749> archiereis chief priests , καὶ <WG2532> kai - οἱ <WG3588> hoi - γραμματεῖς <WG1122> grammateis scribes , καὶ <WG2532> kai and οἱ <WG3588> hoi - πρεσβύτεροι <WG4245> presbyteroi elders

καὶ <WG2532> kai - ἔλεγον <WG2036> elegon they asked αὐτῷ <WG846> autō - . Ἐν <WG1722> En “ By ποίᾳ <WG4169> poia what ἐξουσίᾳ <WG1849> exousia authority ταῦτα <WG3778> tauta these things ? ” ποιεῖς <WG4160> poieis are You doing ἢ <WG2228> ē “ [And] τίς <WG5101> tis who σοι <WG4771> soi You ἔδωκεν <WG1325> edōken gave τὴν <WG3588> tēn the ἐξουσίαν <WG1849> exousian authority ταύτην <WG3778> tautēn - ἵνα <WG2443> hina to ταῦτα <WG3778> tauta [them] ? ” ποιῇς <WG4160> poiēs do

Ὁ <WG3588> Ho - δὲ <WG1161> de - Ἰησοῦς <WG2424> Iēsous Jesus εἶπεν <WG2036> eipen replied αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois . . . , Ἐπερωτήσω <WG1905> Eperōtēsō “ I will ask ὑμᾶς <WG4771> hymas you ἕνα <WG1520> hena one λόγον <WG3056> logon question , ” καὶ <WG2532> kai “ and [if] ἀποκρίθητέ <WG611> apokrithēte you answer μοι <WG1473> moi Me , καὶ <WG2532> kai - ἐρῶ <WG2046> erō I will tell ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin you ἐν <WG1722> en by ποίᾳ <WG4169> poia what ἐξουσίᾳ <WG1849> exousia authority ταῦτα <WG3778> tauta these things . ποιῶ <WG4160> poiō I am doing
